definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: All the fighters landed safely on the airport after the military maneuver.
sentences.chinese: 在军事演习后，所有战斗机都安全降落在机场上。

sentences.english: Beijing denounced the Japanese vessel for shadowing exercises by some of its own warships.
sentences.chinese: 北京则谴责日本舰船隐瞒其军舰的军事演习。

sentences.english: Americans discuss rising tensions during US-South Korea military exercises.
sentences.chinese: 美国人讨论美韩联合军事演习。

sentences.english: Picture: A US-Japan joint military exercise in December 2010. (File Photo/CFP)
sentences.chinese: 上图为2010年12月美日联合军事演习画面。

sentences.english: The air forces of the two countries held a joint exercise last week, at Agra.
sentences.chinese: 上周，两国空军在阿格拉举行了联合军事演习。

sentences.english: North Korea has lashed out at South Korea for hosting a multi-national naval exercise this past week.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜最近指责韩国在上周举行的联合海上军事演习。

sentences.english: The army will run a war-game next month.
sentences.chinese: 下个月军队将会举行一次军事演习。

sentences.english: This week's Sino-Indian military exercises are aimed at defusing some of this tension.
sentences.chinese: 这个星期的中印军事演习旨在缓和双边紧张关系。

sentences.english: They are merely conducting annual joint military exercises.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是例行了年度军事演习。

sentences.english: America has already cancelled some military exercises with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 美国已经取消了一些和俄国的军事演习。

sentences.english: Canada is launching a series of military exercises in the Arctic far-north region of the country.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大在国土北极地区开展一系列的军事演习。

sentences.english: Wargames and conflict simulations are not considered on-topic for BGDF.
sentences.chinese: 模拟军事演习和冲突是没有考虑到为BGDF主题。

sentences.english: Current joint military exercises between South Korea and the United States during the anniversary have led to increased rhetoric from North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 在停战日期间的美韩联合军事演习更北韩了好战言论。

sentences.english: The military exercise ended with a mock battle.
sentences.chinese: 这场军事演习以一场模拟战收尾。

sentences.english: "These exercises are not aimed at Iran," said Dana Perino.
sentences.chinese: 这些军事演习没有针对伊朗。

definition: to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
